CustomField.description: -Off site works including but not limited to survey, pre-planning, and post-event follow-up. -Ability to interface with clients and respond in a timely manner to requests -Ensure that all details & instructions are accurately disseminated to the rest of the department to ensure a smooth operation and enhance customer satisfaction

CustomField.label: Job Site works
